titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the death of the most illustrious princess Heneretta. Dutchess of Orleance, Maddam of France, &c.
titleStmt.author: R. Philopolymathes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Clark at the Harp and Bible in West-smith-field.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "OUR day's o'recast Melpomine come on ..."
Despite the title, this is an elegy to Henrietta Anne, daughter of Henrietta Maria.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
